name: Mir Imad

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: At respond.io, a $10M ARR company, I led the redefinition of business messaging across platforms. I developed cloud infrastructures using microservices and serverless AWS, processing 5M incoming and 8M outgoing messages daily. I improved workflow execution speed by 20%, reduced response times from 700ms to 100ms, and optimized code to reduce AWS Lambda costs by 35%. Previously, at Nimblebot ($1M ARR), I led a tech team of 10 in creating impactful digital products. I specialize in scalable web and mobile solutions, delivering results for projects used by thousands of companies globally.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, tech enthusiast.
resume.description: At respond.io, a $10M ARR company, I led the redefinition of business messaging across platforms. I developed cloud infrastructures using microservices and serverless AWS, processing 5M incoming and 8M outgoing messages daily. I improved workflow execution speed by 20%, reduced response times from 700ms to 100ms, and optimized code to reduce AWS Lambda costs by 35%. Previously, at Nimblebot ($1M ARR), I led a tech team of 10 in creating impactful digital products. I specialize in scalable web and mobile solutions, delivering results for projects used by thousands of companies globally.

bullets: Solved complex backend problems and developed infrastructure to support processing 5 million incoming and 8 million outgoing messages daily.
Optimized conversation performance, reducing response time from 700ms to 100ms, boosting user satisfaction by 30%.
Improved workflow execution speed by 20%, enhancing overall system efficiency.
Enhanced push notifications by implementing batching, reducing delivery time from 10 seconds to 2 seconds, ensuring quicker user engagement.
Collaborated with a team of 15 engineers to achieve these results.

Worked at Nimblebot, a premier provider of design and development services for industry leaders and government organizations (e.g., PayPal, Coursera, MIT, GitHub, HBO, Saudi Tourism Authority, Al Futtaim).
Led the tech team as a product engineer.
Focused on creating products from a customer perspective.
Crafted scalable architectures and built robust systems for web and mobile applications.
Spearheaded the development of the Hyyp mobile application, a social impact network for web 3.0 users.
Ensured the tech process aligns with user needs and market demands.
Engineered a robust biotech research SaaS platform that streamlined data analysis processes
Reducing project turnaround times by 40% and enabling researchers to manage 250+ active projects concurrently with improved accuracy.
Added new modules and features, and wrote unit tests for the existing codebase.
Developed a SaaS security platform with integration support for HR data export.
Created a healthcare portal for families to track vitals, doctor appointments, prescriptions, etc
Built a drag-and-drop form builder for doctors to create patient forms in hospitals.
Collaborated with a large team in an agile setup.

experiences.position: Lead Software Engineer at IT Waly
bullets: Provided consulting and development services for websites, mobile applications, augmented reality solutions, and web-based applications
Utilized top-notch technologies such as Ionic, Flutter, Vuforia, Vue.js, and Node.js.
Employed management tools like Jira and Trello for project coordination.
Managed clients from Fiverr and UpWork, ensuring project requirements were met.
Coordinated and collaborated with fellow freelancers to deliver projects successfully.
Worked in a dynamic startup environment to bring our product to life.
Developed Augmented Reality features using Vuforia in Unity 3D.
Implemented Microsoft's Cognitive APIs for face recognition and detection.
Utilized OpenCV for various image-processing tasks.
Played a key role in creating an AR app with location-based buying and selling features.

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
